<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.CatalogItem</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Helper class to return the proper m2m query for a catalog item</description>
        <name>CatalogItem</name>
        <script><![CDATA[gs.include("PrototypeServer");

var CatalogItem = Class.create();

CatalogItem.prototype = {
    initialize : function() {
		
    },

    getReferenceQual : function() {
        var table_name = current.table_name;
        if (table_name) {
            return 'table=' + table_name;
        }
        return '';
    }
};
]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>glide.maint</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2007-09-24 20:11:46</sys_created_on>

        <sys_policy/>
